Posts.Content: sdmeyers88 wrote: I had 6 weeksnof radiation to my left chest wall, Has anyone else gotten horrible burning in their throat and esophagus. reflux and the like. headaches and memory problems,, the doctors told me none of this was related to rad therapy, i have been done for a month now and still feeling the affects. Posts.Title: radiation.... during and after sdmeyers88 elimar

Posts.Content: Jan 15, 2012 10:02AM sdmeyers88 wrote: I was told by my doctor that radiation was a walk in the park.. It was very stressful, I hated the place, and suffered horrible depression. I dont think i have ever really dealt with the cancer. was diagnosed late july 2011 with thyroid and breast. had thyroid removed august and breast removed sept. expansion,, then rad,  I completed rads this week. Am seriously burned and have tried a lot of remedies, Cant take pain meds and have basically done all of this with no pain meds. I have not got my thyroid hormone regulated,,, is a long process,,. and am getting ready to tske tamoxifen... am on zoloft and klonopin for anxiety... have awful acid reflux and etc... as I ramble on i relalize this is a rad section... so will go back to that subject.. Find that the expander is like a rock and the skin very tight. Looks like I have red dots all over my foob and extreme redness and irritation under my arm. Found out the hard way not to use soap. Have AD ointment, pure aloe, and 1% hydrocortozone cream, I am allergic to the sulfa drug... any help or thoughts... I just need to talk... And ... scared of the tamoxifen
Posts.Title: "Easy" part of treatment? MY A**! BlueCowgirl Tazzy

Posts.Content: sdmeyers88 wrote: Would like to discuss with those who had the expander out and replacement wit silicon or saline. I am going to be a small C on the one foob.My real breast is a sagger and I dont know if I should do a lift or implant. Would like to hear from those who have done this.. Thank God this expander is coming out.After radiation I felt like my muscle tightness and swelling was never going to end.. thanks everyone Dx 9/1/2011, IDC, Left, 1cm, Stage IA, Grade 2, 0/2 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Surgery 9/13/2011 Lumpectomy: Left; Lymph node removal: Left, Sentinel; Mastectomy: Left; Reconstruction (left): Tissue expander placement Radiation Therapy 12/4/2011 Breast Surgery 4/22/2012 Reconstruction (left): Nipple reconstruction, Nipple tattoo, Silicone implant Log in to post a reply

Posts.Content: Apr 6, 2012 10:22PM sdmeyers88 wrote: oh sorry everyone...
Posts.Title: Getting my new Foob sdmeyers88 Erica

Posts.Content: sdmeyers88 wrote: I am new to posting so please bear with me. Had left M with reconstruction(no tram ir diep) Nov 13, 2011. Had been doing fine but with all the pain but maintaining. Had a massive anxiety problem duriing the week of 0ct 10 and basically lost my mind to the point i thought they were going to commit me. The problem was I had my thyroid removed one month prior due to cancer and was being given synthroid at a too high dose. Am very sensitive to drugs so I was hospitalized to detox me me from all meds. I am currently on a low dose of zoloft and low dose antianxiety med. I am feeing much better and going day to day. I realized that i never accepted the fact that i had cancer and was just going with the flow on tests, dr appointments, forms , etc... Never knew what not talking about it would do to me emotionally, I now see a therapist to help me through.. I have returned to work, am a high school science teacher, and am doing daily activities. I am finding it difficult to do simle things such as lifting a milk jug, pulling laundry out of the washer, etc.... I am doing probably more than I should but the anxiety creeps in if i just sit around, I have been getting my TE filled once a week and am on my 4th.. he is doing 30 cc at a time. I have pulling and swelling above where my breast used to be and a "sack"; that forms under my breast weekly which he drains about 40 cc from with a syringe. I have n0 tenderness in my arm but the stinging from the nerves. Chemo is not recommended because the tumor and Cancer did not show in my sentinel nodes. I do need radiation which i have not even read about yet,,, I feel as though I am rambling here. I had invasive ductal carcinoma which was caught early. I need someone to talk to me here about the swelling, trying to do all this without pain/.muscle relax meds(cannot take them) and just basic help. I just need to have someone who has gone down this path to help me... Dx 9/1/2011, IDC, Left, 1cm, Stage IA, Grade 2, 0/2 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Surgery 9/13/2011 Lumpectomy: Left; Lymph node removal: Left, Sentinel; Mastectomy: Left; Reconstruction (left): Tissue expander placement Radiation Therapy 12/4/2011 Breast Surgery 4/22/2012 Reconstruction (left): Nipple reconstruction, Nipple tattoo, Silicone implant Log in to post a reply
